en.text: I was dead. I became quickened. I was tears. I became laughter. The dominion of Love came, and I became the enduring dominion.
en.source: Jalaal Al Deen Rumi, Deewaan. Translated from the Persian by Seyyed Hossein Nasr.

fa.text: مرده بدم زنده شدم گریه بدم خنده شدم دولت عشق آمد و من دولت پاینده شدم
fa.source: Jalaal Al Deen Rumi, Deewaan. Translated from the Persian by Seyyed Hossein Nasr.

ar.text: مرده بدم زنده شدم گریه بدم خنده شدم دولت عشق آمد و من دولت پاینده شدم
ar.source: Jalaal Al Deen Rumi, Deewaan. Translated from the Persian by Seyyed Hossein Nasr.
